meanings.sent1: She felt overwhelmed because her boss overcommunicated every detail.
meanings.sent2: The team was confused because of the overcommunicated instructions.
meanings.sent3: The email was so overcommunicated that it became a jumbled mess.
meanings.sent4: His overcommunicated speech made everyone tune out.
meanings.sent5: The overcommunicated message was lost in a sea of unnecessary information.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she overcommunicated with her friend about the party.
meanings.sent2: He overcommunicated the project details to his team last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat overcommunicated with its loud meows for food.
meanings.sent4: The river overcommunicated its power after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The radio overcommunicated the news of the storm to the entire town.
